page.title: 06CHANGING TIMES
page.content: He attends two churches in the area_ St.Mary's in Bowdon and its daughter church in Bowdon Vale,{St.Luke's}.He also had noticed that the congregations were getting older in years and there few young people in the congregations. He felt that the changes in the services by the{General {Synod}of the Church of England and the fact that the church did not offer enough for young people were the reasons for this. He had very pleasant memories of the old school by St.Mary's church.It was demolished because of its age and deteriorating condition and it was overcrowded,so a bigger school was built to cope with the growing population.
